content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with your heating or air conditioning?
Hi, yes—our air conditioner isn’t working right. I think we need someone to take a look.
I'm sorry to hear that your air conditioner isn’t working properly. Could I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Margaret! Can you please provide your address so I can confirm you’re in our service area?
Thank you! That address is within our service area. When would you ideally like to have a technician come out to take a look at your air conditioner?
I’m not sure yet—my husband really wants to be home for it. I’ll have to check with him first before picking a time.

Of course, Margaret! Feel free to get in touch when you and your husband have found a good time. If you have any other questions or need a price estimate, just let us know. We’ll be happy to help when you’re ready to schedule.
reason: Customer wants to check with spouse before scheduling.
